You can&#039;t out-run yourself

Tim Kearney is an incarcerated former Marine who is offered freedom 
by DEA agent Tad Gruzsa in exchange for impersonating recently-late 
drug lord Bobby Z. Things don&#039;t go as planned, however, 
and Kearney ends up on the run with Bobby Z&#039;s 12-year-old son.
